verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; after the manner of Jeduthun. A Psalm of David. My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1747>waiteth<s%> in silence for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3444>only<s%>: From him cometh my salvation.
He only is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: He is my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>; I shall not be <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H4131>moved<s%>.

How long will ye set <S%H2050>upon<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, That ye may <S%H7523>slay<s%> <S%H5186>him<s%>, all of you, Like a leaning <S%H7023>wall<s%>, like a <S%H1760>tottering<s%> <S%H1447>fence<s%>?

They only <S%H3289>consult<s%> to thrust him <S%H5080>down<s%> from his <S%H7613>dignity<s%>; They <S%H7521>delight<s%> in <S%H3577>lies<s%>; They <S%H1288>bless<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, but they <S%H7043>curse<s%> <S%H7130>inwardly<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
My <S%H5315>soul<s%>, <S%H1826>wait<s%> thou in silence for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8615>only<s%>; For my expectation is from him.
He only is my <S%H6697>rock<s%> and my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: He is my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>; I shall not be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.
With <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> and my <S%H3519>glory<s%>: The <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H5797>strength<s%>, and my <S%H4268>refuge<s%>, is in <S%H430>God<s%>.

Trust <S%H982><s%> in him at all <S%H6256>times<s%>, ye <S%H5971>people<s%>; Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>him<s%>: God is a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for <S%H5542>us<s%>. [[Selah

Surely <S%H120>men<s%> of low degree are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, and <S%H376>men<s%> of high degree are a <S%H3577>lie<s%>: <S%H5927>In<s%> the <S%H3976>balances<s%> they will go <S%H3162>up<s%>; They are together lighter than <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.

Trust <S%H982><s%> not in <S%H6233>oppression<s%>, And become not <S%H1891>vain<s%> in <S%H1498>robbery<s%>: If <S%H2428>riches<s%> <S%H5107>increase<s%>, <S%H7896>set<s%> not your heart <S%H3820>thereon<s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H259>once<s%>, <S%H8147>Twice<s%> have I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2098>this<s%>, That <S%H5797>power<s%> belongeth unto <S%H430>God<s%>.
Also unto <S%H136>thee<s%>, O Lord, belongeth <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>; For thou <S%H7999>renderest<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H4639>work<s%>.
